WorkItem.ClosedComment: Don't optimize Talents... use Talent Specs and build out a set of cookie cutter builds you want to use
WorkItem.Description:
Loaded my DK (attached)
Changed from TankDK to DPSDK
Selected tools/optimizer - left at default setting of optimize DPS
checked the box for talents
scrolled all the way to right on the thoroughness slider
Selected Optimize
OK to enchants missing message
OK to gems not available message (only rares, and jewel crafter gems selected)
Recommended score is 2444, previous was 532
load optimized
do it again
previous 2444 recommended 916
DPS Breakdown on stats tab only lists White, BCB, Necrosis, and Ghoul DPS
load optimized
do it again
previous 916 recommended 886
above steps were repeated multiple times, reloading the character file that is attached at the begining of each iteration
 
 
Same steps as above except
Slide all the way to left then click on the slider line 10 times to move it right some
Previous 532 recommended 2320
again
Previous 2320 recommended 761
again
Previous 761 recommended 2107
 
Most of DPS Breakdown on stats tab is populated
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Optimizations incorrect after initial character load

Comments.Message:
It looks like DPSDK does not support talent optimizations well enough. There is a thread safety issue, the calculations store talents in calculation options which is not a thread safe operation since several calculations with different talents can be going on at the same time.

As a workaround you can go to Tools->Options->General Settings and disable Use Multithreading.
